amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2023, LB705, ยง 135. Operative date July 1, 2024. Act, how cited.
amendatorysection.para: Sections 79-8,124 to 79-8,131 shall be known and may be cited as the Master Teacher Program Act.

crossreference.para: Attracting Excellence to Teaching Program, see section 79-8,133.
Enhancing Excellence in Teaching Program, see section 79-8,137.01.
